alert.note: Alert for Adair; Casey; Lincoln; Russell; Taylor (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 11:44PM EDT until June 26 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lincoln County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Russell County in south central Kentucky... Southeastern Taylor County in central Kentucky... Casey County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Adair County in south central Kentucky... * Until 1215 AM EDT/1115 PM CDT/. * At 1144 PM EDT/1044 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Stanford to 11 miles southwest of Liberty, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Liberty, Stanford, Crab Orchard, Hustonville, Boneyville, Eli, Lawhorn Hill, Teddy, Sano and Gilpin. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
